rect.style: fill: none; fill-opacity:0; stroke-width: 2; stroke-dasharray: 10; stroke: #0000ff

text.tspan: sends "start_profile" (after all instances of Subclient have a connection)
sends "out_files" (after all instances of Subclient finish executing)
sends "<type> <conn. details>" for the file transfer server
sends "p <name of file to be put in 'processed'>" or "o <name of file to be put in 'out'>"
sends file data and terminates connection

path.style: fill: none; fill-opacity:0; stroke-width: 2; stroke-dasharray: 10; stroke: #0000ff
